title: Scandic Hotels all-capital hand-made looking font
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417094531im_/http:/typophile.com/files/scandic_3693.jpg)

Hi, I am looking for the name of the font used on the scandic Hotels webpage. All caps and short of handmade.

[http://www.scandichotels.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417094531/http:/www.scandichotels.com/ "http://www.scandichotels.com")

thank you!

Font: 

 Populaire 

Solved By: 

 [Renko](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417094531/http:/typophile.com/user/12000 "View user profile.")
author: ushua

comments.content: [Populaire](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417094531/http:/www.identifont.com/show?2JQ6) by Pintassilgo Prints (in a custom version for Scandic)
Renko, thanks for the quick reply!
